thread.title: Julian Edelman (Patriots WR) Admits He Moved to L.A. to be Closer to Tom Brady (Patriots QB)
thread.title_full: Julian Edelman (Patriots WR) Admits He Moved to L.A. to be Closer to Tom Brady (Patriots QB) | Complex

author: Jose Martinez
title: Julian Edelman (Patriots WR) Admits He Moved to L.A. to be Closer to Tom Brady (Patriots QB)
text:
There are bromances and then there is the special bond which Julian Edelman and Tom Brady share.
On Tuesday, Oct. 27 at 8 p.m. ET, ESPN will air an E:60 documentary on Edelman where the New England Patriots will discuss a number of topics, including his... unique relationship with Brady. In the trailer for the Edelman doc, the 29-year-old wideout reveals that he moved to Los Angeles to basically be closer to his quarterback.
When asked by ESPN's Jeremy Schaap if he moved to L.A. to be near Brady, Edelman responded, "Well just in the off-season, just in case he needed anything from me."
If you're not consistently telling your bromantical partner how much you love him, like Brady and Edelman did after winning Super Bowl XLIX , then you're doing it wrong.
 Business Insider ]
